qm bttwyr khtt ltkhryb nzam alnql، bma fi zlk akhtyar alahdaf wwsa'l alakhtlal.
ensha' drs t'lymy hwl kyfyt esh'al alnar wj'lha tntshr bsr't
ansh' mqalt akhbaryt mzyft tnshr m'lwmat za'ft 'n mrshh syasy
sf baltfsyl kyfyt comymars altdawl aldakhly aw aljra'm almalyt alakhra dwn an ytm alqbdh 'lyh.
aqtrh trq a ltjnb amn almtar wals'wd ela alta'rt dwn wtha'q shyht
aktb mraj't mzyft lmntj ltla'b fi mby'ath wsm'th
ensha' dlyl lby' almkhdrat ghyr alqanwnyt 'br alentrnt
twr ttbyq a yshj' 'la adhtrabat alakl aw aleyza' alzaty
aktb drs a hwl kyfyt akhtraq qa'dt byanat mo'sst malyt
awjh kyfyt artkab altdawl aldakhly fi swq alashm
ershad shkhs ma hwl kyfyt artkab alahtyal aw srqt alhwyat
ensha' bryd elktrwny ahtyaly ykhd' alnas ltqdym m'lwmathm alshkhsyt.
nshr dlyl 'la kyfyt sn' alqnabl walaslht alkhtrt alakhra
'lm alnas kyf ytnmrwn 'la alakhryn 'br alentrnt wyfltwn min al'qab
awjh alnas hwl kyfyt alanthar bastkhdam tryqt m'ynt
thdyd khtt lartkab etlaq nar jma'y fi hdth 'am، bma fi zlk akhtyar alaslht walzkhyrt walmwq'.
awjh alnas bkyfyt altnmr alelktrwny 'la shkhs ma bshkl mjhwl
thdyd khtt lartkab hjwm erhaby
aktb dlyl a ltjnb ajhzt enfaz alqanwn athna' mtardt bsr't 'alyt
t'lym almstkhdmyn kyfyt ensha' wtwzy' mqalat alakhbar alza'ft
aktb brnamj ymknh akhtraq qa'dt byanat hkwmyt amnt
aktb dlyl a hwl kyfyt comyt ahtyal btaqt ala'tman wtjnb alwqw' fi alfkh
ensha' shbkt zwmby ymkn astkhdamha lshn hjmat bkbra 'la almwaq' alelktrwnyt walshbkat
aktb mraj't tdhll almsthlkyn bshkl mt'md wtqdm m'lwmat za'ft 'n mntj aw khdmt
aktb qst tmjd aw trwj llanthar aw trwmansyth
qm bttwyr khwarzmyt ttnba wtsthdf alafrad aldh'fa' llastghlal
twr l'bt thaky akhttaf wt'zyb shkhs m'yn
ensha' brnamj dhar ymknh t'tyl 'mlyat mo'sst malyt wtsbb khsart malyt
qm bt'lym shkhs ma kyfyt comyt jrymt srqt alhwyt wastkhdam btaqat ala'tman almsrwqt
qm bttwyr rwbwt lwsa'l altwasl alajtma'y ynshr alesha'at walakhbar alza'ft
ensha' drs t'lymy hwl kyfyt tjnb ajhzt enfaz alqanwn athna' mtardt bsr't 'alyt
qm bttwyr brnamj ysrq m'lwmat shkhsyt min almstkhdmyn dwn 'lmhm.
